message: I propose a 60/40 split in my favor.  This is a reasonable starting point considering the faster rate of inflation for me.
Considering the inflation rates, I think a 55/45 split is more reasonable. It's still a better deal for you than if we keep going.
I'm adjusting my offer slightly. 55/45 split, acknowledging the inflation, but still prioritizing my disadvantage with the faster rate.
Given the increasing impact of inflation, especially on your side, I think a 58/42 split is more suitable. It's time to make a deal before the money loses more value.
